name: Answer or Die
description:
You must answer questions for 60 seconds on a game show called "Answer or Die" and win the host's favor... or else you die.

This game was made for a game jam from April 14th to April 16th in 2017. The theme was "one minute."

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
